step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Excellent! Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide.
Great job making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Perfect! Open your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good job on the second rep, keep that arm straight overhead.
Excellent control opening your hand wide.
Nicely done making a tight fist while inhaling.
Fantastic! You're exhaling and relaxing well, visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and open your hand wide. Squeeze into a fist while inhaling, then relax and exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out of your arm.
